name: Pixel Unlock
description:
This is a very fun, interactive, and family puzzle game, designed for players of all ages. It is made to look like a computer screen to encourage children and senior citizens to learn more about computers. None of the levels in this game are age restricted.

(Example : a 12 year old child can play the 25+ level, though he would have less chances of winning)

Softwares used -

Unity

Visual Studio

Pixel Art.com
